text: Practice Problem 3.18 (solution page 368) Starting with C code of the form short test(short x, short y, short z) { short val = ; if ) { it () val = ; else val = ; ) else if ( ) val = ; return val; ) Gcc generates the following assembly code: short test(short x, short y, short z) x in Ã…rdi, y in Jrsi, z in Jrdx test: leaq (%rdx,%rsi), %rax subq %rdi, 4rax cmpq $5, 4rdx jle L2 cmpq $2, 4rsi jle .L3 movq %rdi, 4rax idivq %rdx, %rax ret .L3: movq %rdi, 4rax idivq %rsi, %rax ret .L2: cmpq $3, 4rdx jge .L4 movq %rdx, 4rax idivq %rsi, %rax .L4: rep; ret Fill in the missing expressions in the C code.
